https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/b3qYrT9Z9BbPWXMIZPPWqFKdQhe.jpg Caniba is a fresco about flesh and desire. It reflects on the discomfiting significance of cannibalism in human existence through the prism of one Japanese man, Issei Sagawa, and his mysterious relationship with his brother, Jun Sagawa.
